Articles.Content:
Im sure ill kick myself for not spotting it myself btu i cant seem to find how to warp to maneuver. Anyone know how?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-27T20:30:39Z" title="04/27/2015 08:30  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 27, 2015</time> by AmbApe**

after creating it, click anywhere on the projected orbit track after the node

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-27T20:50:57Z" title="04/27/2015 08:50  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 27, 2015</time> by SanderB**
Be aware, if you are in career mode you need both mission control and the tracking station at least tier 2 in order to create a maneuver.
thanks, found it just before i checked back. appreciate the replies. Im in science mode, but thanks for the heads up on the career mode.
